message: The brand new Tweeten is here! Here's a list of things that's new:
new: You can now download Twitter Videos
Added more options for font sizes
fixes: [Windows] Fixed an issue which prevented the app from removing older update files after updating to a newer app
[Mac] Fixed an issue which resulted in the app not focusing on the compose box when using Touch Bar functions
[Windows] Fixed an issue which resulted in the app not focusing on the compose box when using shortcuts from the tray icon
[Windows] The app no longer requires you to have the 'Show app icon on tray' for the 'Minimize to tray' option to work
[Mac] Fixed the issue which prevented users from pasting their passwords into login window
